title: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to cancel adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog immediately closes. However, the exception list still appears even though the cancellation request was made. It is expected that either the cancellation request is honored and the exception list does not appear, or the cancel button is disabled during the process. To achieve the latter, when calling `ProgressMonitorDialog.run`, pass `false` for the `cancellable` parameter.
